comment.author: 75561834@N03
comment._content:
This Navion later belonged to my father and a friend of his. I remember stripping this orange and black color scheme off prior to painting it white and yellow.

I noticed this had an "Experimental" placard when this photo was taken. Does anyone know what was going on that put it in experimental category during this period?

Bill Putney - N5413K (2nd generation Navion owner)

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/75561834@N03] I am glad you find this photo!  I checked the original, and could find no information as to why "experimental" is on the Navion....I will let you know if I find anything!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
